Info.Title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
Info.Writer: Marianne Wibberley (screenplay), Cormac Wibberley (screenplay), Gregory Poirier (story), Marianne Wibberley (story), Cormac Wibberley (story), Ted Elliott (story), Terry Rossio (story), Jim Kouf (characters), Oren Aviv (characters), Charles Segars (characters)
Info.Actors: Nicolas Cage, Justin Bartha, Diane Kruger, Jon Voight
Info.Plot: Benjamin Gates (Nicolas Cage) must follow a clue left in John Wilkes Booth's diary to prove his ancestor's innocence in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln.
